data.actual_result: The bottom line moves up and down a bit like it's trying to expand or something.
data.expected_result: Nothing happens because the message need not be expanded because it is completely viewable expanding.
data.short_description: When you click on a debug message that is just two lines long or is completely viewable without expanding  of that message, the bottom line moves up and down like it's trying to expand. [Specific to devices with screen sizes LESS THAN or equal to 5.00 inches (diagonally)]
data.steps_to_repro: - Open debug log. - Find a small debug message like `[MessageLoader] Loaded 50 messages for channel [462618014614028288], all loaded: false.` - Click on the message. - Observe the bottom line.
